divs: sighting detailssix orange glowing lights in the sky over burbank, ca 5-20-12 at 8:45 pm pst the six orange glowing lights came from the south (behind griffith park\forest lawn) and traveled across the sky westward slowly ascending until they appeared to be above toluca lake. then each of the orange glowing lights rapidly ascended into the sky in an eastward direction.
Summary: Six Orange Glowing Lights in the Sky over Burbank, CA 5-20-12 at 8:45 PM PST
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Burbank
There were no other sightings in Burbank on or around May 20th 2012
